data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 4Th August, 2023 For Audited Financial Results For The  Quarter & Year Ended 31St March, 2023 / Unaudited Financial Results For The  Quarter  Ended 30Th June, 2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. on 4th August, 2023 has, interalia, considered and approved the Audited Financial Results for the  quarter & year ended 31st March, 2023 / Unaudited Financial Results for the  quarter  ended 30th June, 2023.
